SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope our primary focus is to produce productive citizens and good human beings…”

– Dr. Rachel Fischbaugh, Elementary Principal @FCASD https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/produce-productive-citizens-good-human-beings/
